EmailTemplate.name: TrueCost Email Request
EmailTemplate.subject: It's easy to pick an electric plan at myTrueCost.com
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for contacting CenterPoint Energy with your interest in TrueCost.
To get started, simply go to this link: http://www.mytruecost.com/?utm_source=salesforceworkflow&utm_medium=email&utm_content=TrueCost-Email-Request&utm_campaign=cross-sell
* Register - Set up your account with an email and a password and your service address (where you want electricity).
* Choose your calculation - Use real data if you have your meter number. Otherwise, we can estimate your electricity usage based on similar homes.
* Shop and compare - See estimated all-in prices on multiple providers ranked according to what matters to you.
* Switch to a new plan - Fill out the enrollment form and we'll send your order to your selected electric company.
It's that easy! We'll let you know the status of your switch and send you a reminder when it's time to pick your next plan.
